name: Float
description: Display 3d/2d models on your desktop. Workshop support. Create your models with Unity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel i5 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2 GB DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3.4 GHz Intel i7 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2 GB DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 50 GB available space
